overview: Sin City films presents Joe D'Amato's Epic Western, "Outlaws", starring The King Of The Big Guns, Rocco Siffredi and a mega-cast of the worlds finest sex stars in a blazing tale of a town under siege by a vicious band of sex crazed renegades. Hungry for sin, Pedro's band of thugs ravage every woman in sight. Helpless and hopeless, the town cries out and Rocco answers! An orgy of bullets and blazing hot sex ensues as Rocco and his crew ride in, kick ass, reclaim the town and the women, like a thundering sex-charged cavalry! A Colt 45 wasn't the only lethal weapon in the old west!
tagline: A Colt 45 Wasn't The Only Lethal Weapon In The Old West.
title: Outlaws
